titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the Cathedral & Metropolitical Church of St. Peter in York, on Sunday, Novemb. 17. 1695 by George Halley ...
titleStmt.author: Halley, George, 1655 or 6-1708.

notesStmt.note: Dedication to Thomas Osborne, first Duke of Leeds, contains references to Leeds' position in the council of William III.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
